text: And we want all to eat and drink His Great Philosophy of the four ways of Israel's redemption. Hence "four questions", which are really interrogations to examine into the principles of the four redemptions are asked at the Seder-evening about these "four symbols (the MANISHTANO). And the person who asks these questions is seeking the opinion of the one who is conducting the Seder.
handwritten_text: And we want all to eat and drink His Great Philosophy of the four ways of Israel's redemption. Hence "four questions", which are really interrogations to examine into the principles of the four redemptions are asked at the Seder-evening about these "four symbols (the MANISHTANO). And the person who asks these questions is seeking the opinion of the one who is conducting the Seder.
